PRODUCT_QUALITY_CONTENT: 30Shine Store diversifies all products to help men be more confident and break through in life. More than 200 consumer goods and more than 100 specialized products for hair care, skin care, underwear, socks, etc.
CUSTOMER_POLICY_CONTENT: Thousands of customers have used 30Shine Store products. All 30Shine customers use the products provided by 30Shine Store. No-reason return policy at all 30Shine store systems nationwide. 30Shine Store does everything for customer satisfaction.
DELIVERY_SUPPORT_CONTENT: Fast shipping, home delivery. Call to order and get the product immediately. Safe and convenient COD payment, suitable for all customers.
OUR_PRODUCTS_CONTENT: 30Shine Store brings products from the world's leading brands that are popular with many people.
PRODUCT_DETAILS_CONTENT: Any product that does not meet the standard will be immediately eliminated and destroyed. Consistent finished products ensure quality delivered to consumers.
QUALITY_ASSURANCE_CONTENT: All our products are guaranteed to be well-suited to Vietnamese people, causing no side effects or health impacts with long-term use. Any health effects caused by our products will be fully accountable by the company.
WE_LISTEN_CONTENT: 30Shine Store always listens to customer feedback and suggestions to continuously improve service quality and deliver better products to customers.
CORE_VALUES_CONTENT: With the core value of always treating customers as partners, we aim to bring superior quality products and services to our customers and partners.
VISION_MISSION_CONTENT: 30Shine Store believes and strives every day to bring quality products to men worldwide: healthy, attractive hair and skin; a relaxed spirit to break through in career.
OUR_STRENGTHS_CONTENT: Committed to providing 100% genuine products. The largest product volume with diverse types will meet all your shopping needs.
CUSTOMER_SUPPORT_CONTENT: If customers have any feedback or complaints related to product quality, please contact our customer care hotline.
PRIVACY_POLICY_CONTENT: We are committed to keeping customer information confidential and not sharing it with any third parties.
RETURN_POLICY_CONTENT: We commit to exchanging or returning products if they do not match the description on the website or have technical defects.
WHY_CHOOSE_US_CONTENT: With the mission of creating brand value, we have been, are, and will always strive our best for the development and affirmation of the Vietnamese brand, bringing long-term values to businesses.
MISSION_STATEMENT: The mission of 30Shine Store is to help Vietnamese men achieve a handsome appearance and a refreshing spirit to attract the opposite sex. With experience serving millions of Vietnamese men through providing hair care, facial care, and shampoo products from the 30Shine men's haircut chain, 30Shine Store has affirmed its position as the distributor of genuine men's cosmetics with the best prices on the market. Along with the development of society and the increasing care needs of men, as appearance helps men become more confident and have more opportunities in life. Understanding this, 30Shine Store brings you market-leading product lines at extremely good prices.
title: Contact
information: If you have any questions, please contact us at
